body: @xXSoul.. meh who gives an F. I am so very, very sure the author/artist who made this is desperate for your opinion. But me? I could give two Fs. It’s a fetish bud. Don’t get it, move along. Also, not sure if you noticed but this is not real lol.
You have just seen today's episode of Daily Life in America - Speedrun Edition

....Finding out its not her boyfriend but her best friend ( at first though so, because she looked more boyish compared to the MC's other friend )

read through the most recent pages added....
I began to feel depressed, since... I went through something similar on high school
currently, I am feeling great with myself, at least compared to how I used to be during my childhood...

and as reading this doujin, I am beginning to feel the author is becoming more cruel to his main character the more this continues
for me, it was going okay till page 46...

Said for my last 2 comments I love chubby women....
and it stopped being about that when the problem came around page 54 or somewhere between 

I am not into this type of fetish, but had to read it for myself to see how bad it gets....
the artist has talent....and he is using his best to make this an inflation doujin instead

Gotta change my opinion on where it goes down in page numbers
because...I am okay till 46
and the rest begins to feel depressing honestly
Had the author ended it there
this could be just a doujin about a girl that loves food and helps her connect more closely with her boyfriend who respects her

but seeing the last page on this new batch....I am beginning to feel the boyfriend stopped taking his relationship seriously to let het get as big as inflation comics and weird fanarts...

is this the author's only work at the moment?
because, he got me with a chubby girl, he lost me when it started to become an inflation doujin

until page 54
I can tolerate
but going on after that, it feels like the artist is now full on commited to draw a body that doesn't resemble the same character from 54 or below
its cute at first, I like chubby women
but when it goes and continues, at some point of the story in this doujin, it stopped being wholesome and outright terrible
Chubby women are sexy
obese women are not healthy
I am up for body positivity but the author at some point threw that away just to see how far can he go
( as it stops being about a chubby and cute girl to an inflation fanfiction that could kill anyone in real life )

I like to get to grab more, I dislike the type of people who obsesses over being to thin....  but man, you cannot avoid one extreme and then go to the opposite extreme : /

this is good until page 54 or 40 for me at least

"is this just inflation, but slow?"
I ask myself that, wondering what the hell kind of person drew this. I thought fat people weren't common in Japan, but I also don't get who would want this period.

Maybe a fat girl who wants to feel better?

In history, it has been challenging to stay well-fed, and a little bit of fat in the right places has been well regarded. In the modern age, not eating too much is the challenge, and having only a little bit of fat in the right places is well regarded. Sexualizing fat ess in this day and age would be like sexualizing malnutrition in medieval Europe or something.
Good god bro just stop eating until you can’t damn
yea wtf lmao go to gym girl you really need it
